product_name: Outdoor Research Runout Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When your lead pitch gets a bit dicey, you'll be glad you're wearing the men's Runout Pants from Outdoor Research. Their lightweight ripstop cotton fabric breathes away sweat and stands up to scrapes. Low-profile waist with zip fly and button closure fits cleanly under a climbing harness; partial belt adjusts the fit; loops let you add your own belt. Zippered back-thigh pocket holds a cell phone; large front and rear patch pockets stow gear. Articulated knees and gusseted crotch let you move freely. Outdoor Research Runout Pants for men are durable yet garment washed for softness. Closeout.
short_description: When your lead pitch gets a bit dicey, you'll be glad you're wearing the men's Runout Pants from Outdoor Research. Their lightweight ripstop cotton fabric breathes away sweat and stands up to scrapes.
